00023 class CXLDataTransformBehavior extends CXLActiveRecordBehavior
00024 {
00025   //********************************************************************************
00026   //* Member Variables
00027   //********************************************************************************
00028 
00045   protected $_dateFormat = array(
00046     //  After a find, the date is reformatted as so
00047     'afterFind' => array(
00048       'date' => 'm/d/Y',
00049       'datetime' => 'm/d/Y H:i:s',
00050     ),
00051     //  After a validate, the date is reformatted as so
00052     'afterValidate' => array(
00053       'date' => 'Y-m-d',
00054       'datetime' => 'Y-m-d H:i:s',
00055     ),
00056   );
00057 
00064   protected $_defaultSort;
00065 
00066   //********************************************************************************
00067   //* Property Accessors
00068   //********************************************************************************
00069 
00076   public function getFormat( $eventName = 'afterFind', $formatType = 'date' )
00077   {
00078     return XL::nvl( $this->_dateFormat[$eventName][$formatType], 'm/d/Y' );
00079   }
00080 
00089   public function setFormat( $eventName = 'afterValidate', $formatType = 'date', $format = 'm/d/Y' )
00090   {
00091     if ( !isset( $this->_dateFormat[$eventName] ) )
00092       $this->_dateFormat[$eventName] = array( );
00093 
00094     $this->_dateFormat[$eventName][$formatType] = $format;
00095 
00096     return $this;
00097   }
00098 
00104   public function getDefaultSort()
00105   {
00106     return $this->_defaultSort;
00107   }
00108 
00115   public function setDefaultSort( $sValue )
00116   {
00117     $this->_defaultSort = $sValue;
00118     return $this;
00119   }

00121   //********************************************************************************
00122   //* Protected Methods
00123   //********************************************************************************

00134   protected function _applyFormat( $column, $value, $eventName = 'view' )
00135   {
00136     $_result = $value;
00137 
00138     //  Apply formats
00139     switch ( $column->dbType )
00140     {
00141       case 'date':
00142       case 'datetime':
00143       case 'timestamp':
00144         //  Handle blanks
00145         if ( null != $value && $value != '0000-00-00' && $value != '0000-00-00 00:00:00' && false !== strtotime( $value ) )
00146           $_result = date( $this->getFormat( $eventName, $column->dbType ), strtotime( $value ) );
00147         break;
00148     }
00149 
00150     return $_result;
00151   }
00152 
00158   protected function handleEvent( $eventName, CEvent $event )
00159   {
00160     static $_schema;
00161     static $_schemaFor;
00162 
00163     $_model = $event->sender;
00164 
00165     //  Cache for multi event speed
00166     if ( $_schemaFor != get_class( $_model ) )
00167     {
00168       $_schema = $_model->getMetaData()->columns;
00169       $_schemaFor = get_class( $_model );
00170     }
00171 
00172     //  Not for us? Pass it through...
00173     if ( isset( $this->_dateFormat[$eventName] ) )
00174     {
00175       //  Is it safe?
00176       if ( !$_schema )
00177       {
00178         $_model->addError( __CLASS__, 'Cannot read schema for data formatting' );
00179         return false;
00180       }
00181 
00182       //  Scoot through and update values...
00183       foreach ( $_schema as $_name => $_column )
00184       {
00185         if ( !empty( $_name ) && $_model->hasAttribute( $_name ) && isset( $_schema[$_name], $this->_dateFormat[$eventName][$_column->dbType] ) )
00186         {
00187           $_value = $this->_applyFormat( $_column, $_model->getAttribute( $_name ), $eventName );
00188           $_model->setAttribute( $_name, $_value );
00189         }
00190       }
00191     }
00192 
00193     //  Papa don't preach...
00194     return parent::$eventName( $event );
00195   }
00196 
00197   //********************************************************************************
00198   //* Event Handlers
00199   //********************************************************************************

00217   public function beforeValidate( $event )
00218   {
00219     return $this->handleEvent( __FUNCTION__, $event );
00220   }
00221 
00227   public function afterValidate( $event )
00228   {
00229     return $this->handleEvent( __FUNCTION__, $event );
00230   }
00231 
00237   public function beforeFind( $event )
00238   {
00239     //  Is a default sort defined?
00240     if ( null !== $this->_defaultSort )
00241     {
00242       //  Is a sort defined?
00243       $_criteria = $event->sender()->getDbCriteria();
00244 
00245       //  No sort? Set the default
00246       if ( !$_criteria->order )
00247       {
00248         $event->sender->getDbCriteria()->mergeWith(
00249           new CDbCriteria(
00250             array(
00251               'order' => $this->_defaultSort,
00252             )
00253           )
00254         );
00255       }
00256     }
00257 
00258     return $this->handleEvent( __FUNCTION__, $event );
00259   }
00260 
00265   public function afterFind( $event )
00266   {
00267     return $this->handleEvent( __FUNCTION__, $event );
00268   }
